divs: Sighting DetailsI went for a motorcycle ride headed towards Hot Sulpher Springs near Winterpark, CO. To avoid the rain I took a county road 55 or Cottonwood pass. I noticed a dead cow and decided to investigate. What I found seems to be a classical mutilation case with anus cored, utters clipped, jaw portion removed and looks like it was cauterized. I should mention that the farmer thought that the cow had been dead no more than 48 hours or less, she didn't know how the 2 triangle marks could have been made in front of the utter. She also thought that the cow was pregnant and was puzzled that the animal had not been scavenged much. I took some pics, left the site, then came back and took more pics when the sheriff showed up to make a report. After I was leaving about 8pm went by the animal again. I was looking at the sky as it was raining in the direction I was heading. Then I saw a shooting star, very bright, very close and with an explosion at the end... Very strange night.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Granby

This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: witness on motorcycle ride through mountains sees dead cow in mountain grazing land, stops to investigate
